metadata.description: THE EPIC STORY FROM "MASTER" NOVELIST RAYMOND E. FEIST! The three boys who once were the closest of friends, are now worlds apart: Pug, on the verge of becoming a full-blown magician; Tomas, a warrior losing his humanity to the enchanted armor he wears; and Arutha, the Prince of Crydee.
metadata.name: Magician Master: The Great One
